mapper.sql: d.did, d.oid, d.payer, d.provider, d.amount, d.pay_date, d.for_pay, d.is_back, d.back_date, d.remark, d.ctime
mapper.select: select , (select `name` from corporate c where c.cid=d.payer) payerName, (select `name` from corporate c where c.cid=d.provider) providerName from pro_deposit d where d.did = #{did,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select , (select `name` from corporate c where c.cid=d.payer) payerName, (select `name` from corporate c where c.cid=d.provider) providerName from pro_deposit d where d.oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into pro_deposit
did,
oid,
payer,
provider,
amount,
pay_date,
for_pay,
is_back,
back_date,
remark,

mapper.update:
update pro_deposit
payer = #{payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
provider = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
for_pay = #{forPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_back = #{isBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
back_date = #{backDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where did = #{did,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pro_deposit set payer = #{payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provider = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, for_pay = #{forPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_back = #{isBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, back_date = #{backDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where did = #{did,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
